mapper.select: SELECT appr_no , form_name , appr_title , user_name , department_name , create_date FROM approval JOIN appr_form ON approval.appr_type=appr_form.appr_type JOIN employee ON approval.user_no=employee.user_no LEFT JOIN department ON approval.dept_no=department.department_id WHERE appr_status=#{apprStatus}

SELECT appr_no , appr_title , appr_content , create_date , department_name , user_name , form_name , form_path FROM approval JOIN appr_form ON approval.appr_type=appr_form.appr_type JOIN employee ON approval.user_no=employee.user_no LEFT JOIN department ON approval.dept_no=department.department_id WHERE appr_no=#{apprNo}
